teleconsultation-prompt: Need a quick consultation? Start a video call with an available doctor now.
ai-symptom-checker-desc: Get a preliminary assessment of your symptoms and find the right care.
find-a-doctor-desc: Search for doctors and clinics near you and book appointments.
my-appointments-desc: View your upcoming and past appointments with healthcare providers.
my-prescriptions-desc: Access your digital prescriptions and medication schedules.
login-desc: Enter your email below to login to your account
signup-desc: Enter your information to create an account
select-language-desc: Please choose your preferred language to continue.
search-doctor-clinic: Search by doctor or clinic name...
symptom-triage-placeholder: e.g., I have a headache, fever, and a sore throat for the last 2 days.
preliminary-assessment-desc: Based on the symptoms you provided, here is our AI's suggestion.
urgency-emergency-desc: This may be a medical emergency. Please seek immediate medical attention.
urgency-medium-desc: We recommend consulting a doctor soon.
urgency-low-desc: Your symptoms appear to be non-urgent, but consulting a doctor is advised.
share-summary-doctor: You can share this summary with your doctor.
